title: The Complete eDating Advice Comedy Series for Women
description: Sick of wasting your time with e-men? Sick of cheap dates gone awry? How about starting from the top! Yes, you can get it right every time. "The Complete eDating Advice Comedy Series for Women" is even for those hardened souls who repeatedly venture online for kibbles and bits. Get the quick and easy way to categorize all those men online so you'll sally forth with dates instead of sitting home, lonely and dejected. "The Complete eDating Advice Comedy Series for Women" is the ONLY comedy lampooning online dating guides, sites and books while dispensing no-holds barred advice from the Bubbameistah, a witty and sassy broad. Laugh on the road to understanding what's really going on out there! This edition includes three formerly published ebooks: Men, eDating and Mast*****ion, eWomen are Lunatics and Zombie Men, eDating and Mastication.If you want to know why those terrific men online rarely translate offline, then "The Complete eDating Advice Comedy Series for Women" is the book for you.
author: Maura Stone
